snippet: ROKITO--Michael Barry, O.D. On May 1, 2016 at the age of 80, of Roslyn, NY. Beloved husband of Evelyn. Loving father of Andrew (Susan), Steven (Jodi) and Alyssa (Robert) Unikel. Adored grandfather of Shelby, Ariel, Lindsay, Jackson, Ryan, Josh and Matthew. Cherished brother of Andrea (Harvey) Kaplan. Dear brother-in-law of Gilda and the late Richard Schwartz. Optometrist for over 45 years, respected and loved by his patients. Services Wednesday 11:30am at Temple Beth Torah, Westbury, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROKITO, MICHAEL BARRY
